QuestData.Title: Fighting on All Fronts
QuestData.Description:
We are nearly ready to siege the gates. Your efforts here have been monumental, $n.
But let us not forget that you are also the $ct. Your forces rely on you to command them. No single person can stand against the Legion.
Continue your duty. Guide the $cs of Azeroth, and victory will be assured.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete 5 missions from your Order Hall.
